caption.p: Effect of rhamnan sulfate (RS) on human platelet aggregation induced by ( a) collagen, ( b) thrombin, and ( c) ristocetin. Concentrations of collagen, thrombin, and ristocetin to induce platelet aggregation are 0.3 mg/mL, 1.25 U/mL, and 1 mg/mL, respectively. Significant difference in values between the sample without RS and the sample with RS are shown as * p < 0.01. The data are cited from [ 14]. Reproduced with permission from Springer Nature, 2019.
